titleStmt.title: A light to the longitude, or, The use of an instrument called the seaman's director speedily resolving all astronomical cases and questions concerning the sun, moon, and stars : with several propositions whereby sea-men may find at what meridian and longitude they are at in all parts of the world : published for the advance of navigation / by Robert Theaker.
titleStmt.author: Theaker, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Godbid for William Fisher ...,

notesStmt.note: The table of contents and the epistle ([4] p.) are bound and photographed between pages 30 and 31.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
